DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a controlled release formulation of pregabalin administered once daily as compared to placebo in the treatment of fibromyalgia. All patients will receive pregabalin; half of the patients will receive placebo at some point in the study.
DOC.brief_title: Study Of A Controlled Release Formulation Of Pregabalin In Fibromyalgia Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients must have fibromyalgia. Patients with other painful conditions cannot participate.
